オプション1: Star Man boarded the raft and rowed toward the Republic of GEFORQE.

Three hours later, land was gone from sight and there was only sea
in every direction. In that moment, the ocean felt to Star Man not
beautiful or bountiful, but a world of death.

If he pushed too hard, he'd collapse, so he kept rowing with breaks.
He was always wet, and the rocking made sleep impossible.
If he slept he'd drift away, so he chose to row on without sleeping.
